Checkout: Review your cart and proceed to checkout.
Enter Code: At checkout, enter Life Pharmacy coupon code "D48" in the designated field.
Apply Discount: Click "Apply" to see your 10% savings.
Complete Order: Finalize your purchase with payment and shipping details.
